forumNotes.author: pokemon1
forumNotes.content:
So it is linux type. From your isolinux menu it looks like the kernel file is img2a \& initrd file is img3a.  

I assume you have abovementioned 2 files in the root of iso? if not please list the root folder structure and files within it.   

Is your grub2 menu entry looks like below? If not, please try the below.  

menuentry "toolcenter" {  
set isofile="/youriso.iso"  
loopback loop $isofile  
linux (loop)/img2a vga=0x317 root=/dev/ram0 rw ramdisk_size=100000 dimmdata=00000000 debug_level=1 silent_boot=no boot_src=3  
initrd (loop)/img3a  

\<Is there anything that i can do to extract it and mount straight by using the grub2?\> Lets try iso loading directly, if it does not work then we will try by extracting.  

Regards,
